trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> A flyer for attracting prospective employees catches your eye.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Mord taskmaster.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_TODO_01<tab>Search for the client.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the unsavory Mord.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_TODO_03<tab>Express your /doubt to the Mord taskmaster.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_POSTER03366_000_000<tab>Onest paye foR onest woRk! No expeerRians ness ess haiRy!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>It appears to be a job advertisement. Speak with the Mord taskmaster for details.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>It appears to be a job advertisement, most likely written by the Mord taskmaster.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_020<tab>Mmm... You'll do. Here for work, are we?
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_021<tab>Good, good! Honest pay for honest work, that's my motto!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_022<tab>Your timing could not be better. I have a job for you.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_023<tab>Take this package to my client, who is outside the village, to the south. Mord fellow, you will know him when you see him. Probably.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_024<tab>Now, listen carefully. You must not peek inside, no matter what! Is that clear? Good. Now, off you go!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_030<tab>You understood my instructions, yes? Then why are you still here?
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_040<tab>Ah, there is the parcel. Get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_050<tab>You are back!? But that was not how─ Ahem! The client will ah...re-unpurse you, I mean, reimburse you. Now, be off!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_060<tab>You were not supposed to fight back! Not fair, not fair!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_061<tab>Our job was to steal the package, not to hurt anyone, I swear!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_062<tab>Ask the taskmaster! Yes! He will tell you everything.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_070<tab>Please, no more! No more!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_080<tab>Is there a problem? Still looking for the client, are we?
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>He seems to be hiding something. Use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> emote to wring the truth from him.
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_090<tab>No, stop! I can explain!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_091<tab>The truth is, there is no client. And the package is full of nothing but rocks. Not expensive ones, either. Just rocks!

TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_092<tab>I hire people to deliver the parcel and another group of thugs to steal it. When they return to me empty-handed, I demand compensation for the loss of my wares. No blood spilled, just coin changing hands, that is all!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_093<tab>Please, boss, no more. This is too complicated, too dangerous!
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_094<tab>You are right. There must be easier ways to make money. We need something that requires less effort, less risk! Hmm...
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_095<tab>Ahem! Kind traveler, will you accept this as an apology? And maybe no one needs to know about this, yes?
